entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -33.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -33.4°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -36.4°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
